tweet: To those that claim that I sold at the ATH, I actually did not. I sold on 3 separate times: 12/8 @ ~$96, 12/11 @ ~$155, and 12/18 @ ~$350. The average price that I got was $205.  It's nobody's business at what price I sold my LTC at, but I got tired of all the "sold at ATH" hate.
